code: import{sessions}from'../sessions';import{getRoles}from'../api';import{ROLE}from'../constants';export const fetchRoles=async hash=>{const accessRoles=[ROLE.ADMIN];const access=await sessions.access(hash,accessRoles);if(!access){return{error:'Доступ запрещен',res:null};}const roles=await getRoles();return{error:null,res:roles};};
